faq.question: What types of meeting notes does it work with?
faq.answer: All formats: board meeting minutes, team meeting notes, project updates, client meetings, investor meetings, and more.

faq.question: Can it identify who's responsible for each action item?
faq.answer: Yes! Our AI links action items to specific attendees mentioned in the notes.

faq.question: Does it extract deadlines and dates?
